protein.specific_function: This protein is an anticoagulant protein that acts as an indirect inhibitor of the thromboplastin-specific complex, which is involved in the blood coagulation cascade

reference.reference_text: Hauptmann R, Maurer-Fogy I, Krystek E, Bodo G, Andree H, Reutelingsperger CP: Vascular anticoagulant beta: a novel human Ca2+/phospholipid binding protein that inhibits coagulation and phospholipase A2 activity. Its molecular cloning, expression and comparison with VAC-alpha. Eur J Biochem. 1989 Oct 20;185(1):63-71.
Chang KS, Wang G, Freireich EJ, Daly M, Naylor SL, Trujillo JM, Stass SA: Specific expression of the annexin VIII gene in acute promyelocytic leukemia. Blood. 1992 Apr 1;79(7):1802-10.
